author: jstrachan
msg: Patched the <j:file> tag so that the XML declaration can now be omitted if required. Also the output can be pretty-printed if required.
The XML encoding mode can be specified as can the output mode, so HTML output is now supported.
Also added a log4j.properties so that tests can log again.

author: donaldp
msg: Inherit runtime of jakarta-ant. Preparation for ant to allow ant to have dependencies that automagically get used withou any changes to end users

author: jstrachan
msg: Added support for nested <action> tags in the JellySwing library so that inside common widgets such as <menuItem> or <button> an Action can be specified, which can even use Jelly script to invoke itself, such as to make a new widget / view appear etc.
Moving forward, maybe much of UIs glue/controller code could just be Jelly script, then we focus just on building the Models and use XML/Jelly for the View and Controllers?

author: jstrachan
msg: add helper target demo:junitui to show the JUnit Swing TestRunner front end. We should try make this a standard target in Maven...
